plot: A bully's newsboy son steals a pensioner's medals, is run over, and dies.
title: Polly the Girl Scout and Grandpa's Medals
plot_es: A bully's newsboy son steals a pensioner's medals, is run over, and dies.
original_name: Polly the Girl Scout and Grandpa's Medals
plot_en: A bully's newsboy son steals a pensioner's medals, is run over, and dies.
